attributes.action: ALLOW SMOKING IN PUBLIC PLACES - BUT BAN PREGNANT WOMEN FROM SMOKING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TALK ABOUT GETTING YOUR PRIORITIES WRONG..12 MILLION SMOKERS ( MAINLY VOTERS!) HAVE TO REFRAIM FROM SMOKING IN PUBLIC TO GIVE THE NON SMOKERS A 'CHOICE' YET PREGNANT WOMEN CAN LEGALLY SMOKE UNTIL THEIR HEARTS ARE CONTENT - WHAT ABOUT THE BABIES CHOICE?

rejection.details: remove all the capital please to make it easier for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
